attributes.action: Scrap this system of petitions to the Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They appear to be one-way only. I wanted to object to the petitions on road pricing and on scrapping speed cameras, but was unable to do so. Petitions encourage knee-jerks, not thought. For real public opinion to be ascertained, people must have sufficient information to make a balanced judgment.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
